channel.title: Crime on NewsStreet
channel.description: Recent content in Crime on NewsStreet

item.title: जेल गया तो सौतेले भाई के साथ रहने लगी थी पत्नी, मौका ढूंढ 5 महीने बाद कुल्हाड़ी से काट डाला
item.description: जेल गया तो सौतेले भाई के साथ रहने लगी थी पत्नी, मौका ढूंढ 5 महीने बाद कुल्हाड़ी से काट डाला पुलिस ने बताया कि आरोपी युवक की हालत नाजुक है.

item.title: Chandigarh: Panjab University Student arrested on suspicion of terror links, was receiving funds from ISI agents
item.description: Chandigarh: Panjab University Student arrested on suspicion of terror links, was receiving funds from ISI agents Panjab University student Arshdeep has been arrested on suspicion of terror financing

item.title: Court sentences man to 20 years rigorous imprisonment for raping 10-year-old girl
item.description: Court sentences man to 20 years rigorous imprisonment for raping 10-year-old girl Berhampur: A court in Odisha’s Ganjam district Tuesday sentenced a 53-year-old man to 20 years rigorous imprisonment for raping a girl three years ago.

item.title: Assam: Executive Magistrate, SP, other cops and govt doctors arrested for protecting accused in rape and murder of a minor girl
item.description: Assam: Executive Magistrate, SP, other cops and govt doctors arrested for protecting accused in rape and murder of a minor girl Senior govt officials arrested in Assam after they tried protect a rape and murder accused in exchange for money by terming it a suicide case
